definition: bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Ascorbyl oleic acid ester is a good kind of antioxidant.
sentences.chinese: 抗壞血酸油酸酯具有強抗氧化作用。

sentences.english: Vitamin C, also known as ascorbic acid, is a water-soluble vitamin.
sentences.chinese: 維他命C，又名抗壞血酸，是一種水溶性維生素。

sentences.english: The result showed that citric acid and vitamin C had a better fresh-keeping effect.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，檸檬酸和抗壞血酸的保鮮效果較好。

sentences.english: This method can be used for the determination of ascorbic acide in pharmaceuticals with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 此方法已用於藥劑中抗壞血酸的測定，結果滿意。

sentences.english: Vitamin C, which is also known as ascorbic acid, is one of the most powerful anti-oxidants.
sentences.chinese: 維他命C，也叫抗壞血酸，就是最好的抗氧化劑之一。

sentences.english: The method of measuring ascorbic acid in Platycarya longipes Wu on spectrophotometer was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討圓果化香樹中抗壞血酸含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: Glyoxylate rather than ascorbate is an efficient precursor for oxalate biosynthesis in rice.
sentences.chinese: 乙醛酸比抗壞血酸更能作爲水稻草酸合成的前體物質。

pinyin: huang2 tong2 lei4 hua4 he2 wu4

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
